title: Store Down!!
body: Why is the store down and when will it be back up?

replies.body:
As the in-game ticker and [**Service Status Page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) mention, the store is temporarily unavailable while we look into some issues that were reported.

I can't provide an ETA on when it will be back up, but please let me know if you have any questions!
Hi, the store is back online but I cant buy a 4800ip champ With 5000 ip in bank..
